howToGetIt: ADMISSION PROCESS - To begin the admissions process, please complete the application form. (email jasmine@appletreesf.org to request application) Once application is received, the team will contact you to discuss the next steps. A tour of facility will be arranged, offering you the opportunity to experience the environment and the programs provided. When a spot becomes available, you will be notify ASAP. Please note that a $75 application fee is required at this stage. Upon acceptance into the program, a deposit of $1,500 will be required to secure your child’s place. The deposit is refundable if the spot is relinquished at least 60 days before the scheduled start date.
cost: This is a fee based service.
